package rotate;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;

public class Main {
	
	private static final String FILE = ("C:\\Users\\Chiefan\\Documents\\rotate2.txt");

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String fline;
		try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("C:\\Users\\Chiefan\\Documents\\rotate1.txt"))) {
			fline = br.readLine();
			for (int i = 1; i <= Integer.parseInt(fline); i++) {
				String[] all = br.readLine().split("\\s+");
				int num = Integer.parseInt(all[0]);
				int rotate = Integer.parseInt(all[1]);
				System.out.println(i + ". " + rotate(num, rotate));
				try (BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(FILE, true))) { 
					bw.write(i + ". " + rotate(num, rotate));
					bw.newLine();
				}
				catch (IOException e1) { 
					e1.printStackTrace();
				}
				
			}
		}
		catch (IOException e) { 
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}
	public static String rotate(int n, int r) { 
		double rm = 0;
		double rt = Math.pow(10, r);
		rm = n / rt;
		
		String test = Double.toString(rm);
		String s[] = test.split("\\.");
		String before = s[0];
		String after = s[1];
		
		
		return after + before;
	}

}
